bighaloparticles: This table contains information about particles in large dark matter halos. Each entry is one particle. 'fof_halo_tag' refers to the halo that the particle belongs to, and also serves as a reference key to relate this table to other tables in the database.
coreparticles: This table contains information about core particles, the subset of particles that occupy the central region of dark matter halos. Each entry is one particle. 'fof_halo_tag' refers to the halo that the particle belongs to, and also serves as a reference key to relate this table to other tables in the database.
galaxyparticles: This table contains information about particles in galaxies. Each entry is one particle. 'gal_tag' refers to the galaxy that the particle belongs to, and also serves as a reference key to relate this table to the 'galaxyproperties' table.
galaxyproperties: This table contains properties of a galaxy where 'fof_halo_tag' refers to the dark matter halo it belongs to. Each entry is one galaxy. 'gal_tag' refers to the id of the galaxy, and also serves as a reference key to relate this table to the 'galaxyproperties' table.
galaxypropertybins: This table contains binning information of the particles in a galaxy.
haloparticles: This table contains information about particles in dark matter halos. Each entry is one particle. 'fof_halo_tag' refers to the halo that the particle belongs to, and also serves as a reference key to relate this table to other tables in the database.
haloparticletags: This table contains relational database information. Each entry is one particle. 'fof_halo_tag' refers to the halo that the particle belongs to. 'id' refers to the unique identifier for each particle.
haloproperties: This table contains properties of dark matter halos computed by the friend-of-friends (fof) algorithm or spherical overdensity (sod) algorithm. Each entry is one dark matter halo. 'fof_halo_tag' refers to the halo that the particle belongs to, and also serves as a reference key to relate this table to other tables in the database.
sodbighaloparticles: This table contains information about particles in a dark matter halo, where the dark matter halo was calculated using the spherical overdensity (sod) algorithm. Each entry is one particle. 'fof_halo_tag' refers to the halo that the particle belongs to, and also serves as a reference key to relate this table to other tables in the database.
